title: James Blake
description:
James Blake (professional tennis player) and Justin reminisce about their high school days in Connecticut. They also discuss how to talk about racism with kids, and the 2015 NYPD racial profiling incident that James was involved with. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
